title: Sri Lanka receives diesel consignment from India
body_lines: A shipment of 40,000 metric tonnes of diesel supplied under Indian assistance reached Colombo yesterday evening.
The High Commission of India in Colombo mentioned this on its official Twitter handle.

Powering #SriLanka 🇱🇰!!!! A shipment of 40,000 MT of diesel supplied under #Indian assistance reached #Colombo yesterday evening. pic.twitter.com/cKK9UzPfgb— India in Sri Lanka (@IndiainSL) May 31, 2022
